item.title: Management of multiple containers
item.description: Introduction of docker compose Docker compose helps us manage multiple containers with a file. Define a network Define containers For each container, it defines their images, environments, ports and so on. Docker network configuration Network information Setting the name of docker network I set the name to dev-net. IP range of devnet was set to 192.168.100.0/24. Namely, all of containers in dev-net network have 192.
